item.title: US-191 South at WY-28
item.description: US-191 South at WY-28 in Farson. Use WY-28 West for Kemmerer; WY-28 East for Lander.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-191 South approaching WY-28. Use WY-28 east for South Pass City State Historical Site.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-191 South approaching WY-28 in Farson.

item.title: End WY-28 at US-287/WY-789
item.description: End WY-28 at US-287/WY-789. Turn right for US-287/WY-789 South to Rawlins. Continue straight for US-287/WY-789 North to Lander.

item.title: End WY-28 East at US-287/WY-789
item.description: End WY-28 East at US-287/WY-789 in Fremont County.

item.title: WY-28 East - Continental Divide
item.description: WY-28 East - Continental Divide (South Pass) - Elevation 7550 Feet.

item.title: WY-28 East - Wyoming Women Suffrage Pathway
item.description: WY-28 East - Wyoming Women’s Suffrage Pathway - Home of the Woman’s Vote. The Wyoming Women’s Suffrage Pathway is a 19 mile stretch of WY-28 over South Pass commemorating the 150th anniversary of the Wyoming law allowing women the right to vote.

item.title: WY-28 East - Fremont County
item.description: Entering Fremont County on WY-28 east.

item.title: WY-28 East - Sublette County
item.description: Entering Sublette County on WY-28 east.

item.title: WY-28 East at US-191
item.description: WY-28 east at US-191 in Farson. Turn left for US-191 North to Pinedale; right for US-191 South to Rock Springs. Continue straight on WY-28 East for Lander.

item.title: WY-28 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WY-28 east. Distance to Farson.

item.title: WY-28 East - Sweetwater County
item.description: WY-28 East in Sweetwater County

item.title: WY-372 South Approaching WY-28 East
item.description: WY-372 South approaching WY-28 East in Sweetwater County.

item.title: End WY-28 West at WY-372
item.description: End WY-28 west at WY-372. Use WY-372 north for Kemmerer; use WY-372 south for Green River.

item.title: WY-28 West at US-191
item.description: WY-28 west at US-191. Use US-191 north for Pinedale; US-191 south for Rock Springs. Continue west on WY-28 for Kemmerer.

item.title: WY-28 West Approaching US-191
item.description: WY-28 west approaching US-191 in Farson.

item.title: US-287/WY-789 North at WY-28
item.description: US-287 North/WY-789 North at WY-28. Turn left for WY-28 to Rock Springs; turn right for US-287/WY-789 to Lander.

item.title: US-287/WY-789 North Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-287/WY-789 North approaching WY-28. Use US-287/WY-789 north for Lander. Use WY-28 west for Rock Springs.

item.title: US-287/WY-789 North Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-287/WY-789 North approaching WY-28. Use WY-28 west for South Pass City State Historic Site.

item.title: US-287/WY-789 North Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-287/WY-789 North approaching WY-28.

item.title: US-287 South at WY-789
item.description: US-287 South at WY-789. Turn left for WY-789 north to Riverton. Continue ahead for US-287/WY-789 South to WY-28, Rawlins, and Rock Springs.

item.title: US-191 North Approaching WY-28
item.description: US-191 north approaching WY-28 in Farson. Use WY-28 east for South Pass City State Historic Site.

item.description: US-191 North approaching WY-28 in Farson.
